item.title: The Metamorphosis
item.description: Franz Kafka, 1915, an absurdist? modernist? Novella I‚Äôm sure tons has been written about this bad boy, but I‚Äôm going to take a crack at it before reading any other analyses, then see later if I‚Äôm stupid.

item.title: A Psalm for the Wild-Built
item.description: Becky Chambers, 2021, a Science Fiction/Solarpunk Novella The story is set in a post-AI utopia, where the robots, upon gaining consciousness, fled into the wild, and humanity rebuilt its society with a reverence to nature, including technology.

item.title: On Good Vegan Recipes
item.description: Most vegan recipes that you find are bad. In two ways: the food they try to make is bad, and the recipe layouts are bad.

item.title: Cooking Techniques
item.description: Cooking onions quickly (the baking powder trick) Sauteing mushrooms efficiently Cooking beans well (the teabag trick) Cauliflower cooking effects Emulsifying soup with bread Use the long thing eggplants in most applications! Big ones just for baba ganoush.
